item.title: Bill Hwang 的 Archegos：该基金以 100 亿美元惨败的时间表
item.description: 价值 360 亿美元的私人投资公司 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年轰然倒塌，其创始人黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）于周三抵达法庭，开始接受刑事审判。【原文：Sung Kook “Bill” Hwang, founder of the $36 billion private investment firm Archegos Capital Management which collapsed spectacularly in 2021, arrived in court on Wednesday for the start of his criminal trial.】

item.title: PIMCO 因通胀风险增加美国以外地区的债券投资
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 周三表示，由于通胀可能使美联储降低利率的转变复杂化，该公司正在增加其在美国以外发达市场的债券敞口。【原文：U.S. bond giant PIMCO said on Wednesday it is increasing its bond exposure in developed markets outside the United States as inflation could complicate the shift of the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 美联储库克称家庭、银行和企业的财务状况基本稳健
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周三表示，美国家庭、银行和企业的财务状况基本稳健，有能力支付债务，并有足够强大的缓冲能力来吸收潜在的冲击。【原文：U.S. households, banks and firms are largely in solid financial shape, with the means at hand to cover debt payments and with strong enough buffers to absorb potential shocks, Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通用汽车将停止生产雪佛兰迈锐宝，转而生产电动汽车
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周三表示，为了生产新型电动汽车，该公司将在今年晚些时候停止生产汽油动力汽车雪佛兰迈锐宝（Chevrolet Malibu）。【原文：General Motors said Wednesday it will end production of its gasoline-powered Chevrolet Malibu car later this year in order to produce new electric vehicles.】

item.title: 尼日利亚拒绝接受 Binance 首席执行官的贿赂指控，称其为 "转移视线的策略
item.description: 尼日利亚当局周三否认了 Binance 首席执行官索贿的指控，称这是一种 "转移视线的策略 "和 "敲诈行为"，目的是破坏正在进行的针对该公司的刑事指控。【原文：Nigerian authorities on Wednesday denied allegations from Binance's CEO of soliciting bribes, saying the claim was a "diversionary tactic" and an "act of blackmail" aimed at undermining ongoing criminal charges against the company.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华纳兄弟 Discovery 计划削减新成本，提高 Max 价格
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，华纳兄弟探索公司正在寻找更多机会，以削减成本并提高其 Max 流媒体平台的价格。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery is looking at additional opportunities for cost-cutting and raising prices for its Max streaming platform, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国批准首批基因编辑小麦，向粮食作物开放转基因技术
item.description: 随着中国政府谨慎地推进转基因粮食作物的商业化种植，中国首次批准了基因编辑小麦的安全性。【原文：China has approved the safety of gene-edited wheat for the first time as Beijing cautiously moves forward with commercial growing of genetically modified food crops.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称经济可能需要走弱才能实现 2% 的通胀率
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周三表示，美国经济需要降温，这是使通胀率回到央行2%目标的一个途径。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said on Wednesday that the U.S. economy needs to cool off as an avenue toward getting inflation back to the central bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 中国对外投资规则将于今年年底前完成--美国官员
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）周三表示，她预计美国对华境外投资限制的实施细则将于今年年底完成。【原文：Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said Wednesday she expects rules to implement U.S. outbound investment restrictions on China will be completed by the end of the year.】

item.title: 标普全球称，在资产超过 30 亿美元的美国贷款机构中，NYCB 的股票最便宜
item.description: S&P Global Market Intelligence 周三的分析显示，在资产超过 30 亿美元的贷款机构中，纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）连续第二个月成为美国最便宜的银行股。【原文：New York Community Bancorp was the cheapest U.S. bank stock among lenders with more than $3 billion in assets for the second straight month, an analysis by S&P Global Market Intelligence showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于专家组暂时排除了出售的可能性，Tripadvisor 股票下挫
item.description: 周三，Tripadvisor 股价暴跌 38%，有望创下有史以来最糟糕的一天，此前这家在线旅行社排除了目前出售的可能性，并公布了意外的季度亏损。【原文：Tripadvisor shares slumped 38% and were on track for their worst day ever on Wednesday, after the online travel agency ruled out a possible sale at this time and posted a surprise quarterly loss.】

item.title: 谷歌就广告技术行为在英国打了一场价值 170 亿美元的官司
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 已敦促伦敦一家法庭阻止一起大规模诉讼，该诉讼指控谷歌滥用其在网络广告市场的主导地位，这是该搜索巨头商业行为受到关注的最新一起案件。【原文：Google parent Alphabet has urged a London tribunal to block a mass lawsuit which accuses it of abusing its dominance in the online advertising market, in the latest case to focus on the search giant's business practices.】

item.title: 谷歌 DeepMind 发布下一代药物发现人工智能模型
item.description: 谷歌Deepmind发布了其人工智能模型 "AlphaFold "的第三个重要版本，旨在帮助科学家更有效地设计药物和针对疾病。【原文：Google Deepmind has unveiled the third major version of its "AlphaFold" artificial intelligence model, designed to help scientists design drugs and target disease more effectively.】

item.title: 福克斯公司利润超出预期，成本下降有助于抵消广告收入的疲软
item.description: 福克斯公司（Fox Corp）周三公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是支出减少，尽管其收入因广告业务疲软而下滑超过 15%。【原文：Fox Corp beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, due to lower expenses, even as its revenue tumbled more than 15% on weakness in its advertising business.】

item.title: 消息人士称贝恩资本正在洽谈收购教育软件商 PowerSchool
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，收购公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）正在洽谈将教育软件提供商 PowerSchool 私有化。【原文：Buyout firm Bain Capital is in talks to take education-software provider PowerSchool private, a person familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 辉瑞同意解决 1 万多起善达（Zantac）癌症诉讼 - 彭博新闻社
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引熟悉该交易的人士的话报道，辉瑞公司已同意就1万多起与现已停产的胃灼热药善达克（Zantac）有关的癌症风险案件达成和解。【原文：Pfizer Inc has agreed to settle more than 10,000 cases about cancer risks related to the now discontinued heartburn drug Zantac, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份批发库存下降 0.4%，未作修正
item.description: 美国 3 月份批发库存下降，证实库存投资拖累了第一季度的经济增长。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories fell in March, confirming that inventory investment was a drag on economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 土耳其竞争委员会在数据共享调查中对 Meta 公司罚款 3720 万美元
item.description: 土耳其竞争委员会周三结束了对 Meta Platforms 旗下 Facebook、Instagram、WhatsApp 和 Threads 平台数据共享的两项独立调查，对 Meta Platforms 罚款 12 亿里拉（3720 万美元）。【原文：Turkey's competition board fined Meta Platforms 1.2 billion lira ($37.20 million) on Wednesday after concluding two separate investigations on data-sharing in its Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Threads platforms.】

item.title: 保险公司拒绝雪佛龙公司就伊朗石油扣押事件索赔 5,700 万美元
item.description: 根据周二提交给美国加利福尼亚州一家法院的一份诉状，三家保险公司拒绝了雪佛龙公司就去年伊朗扣押石油货物一事提出的索赔要求。【原文：Three insurance companies have rejected Chevron's claim over the seizure last year of an oil cargo by Iran, according to a complaint filed on Tuesday in a U.S. court in California.】

item.title: 现代汽车计划在现有投资范围内为美国工厂增加混合动力车--执行官
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co）计划利用其在美国的电动汽车（EV）工厂生产混合动力汽车。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co plans to use the investment it has already lined up for the United States to produce hybrid vehicles at its electric vehicle (EV) plant there.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官发言反对限制对华贸易
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）首席执行官奥拉-凯勒纽斯（Ola Kaellenius）周三表示反对限制对华贸易，并强调中国仍是该集团最重要的市场。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Chief Executive Ola Kaellenius on Wednesday spoke against imposing restrictions on trade with China, stressing that the country remains the group's most important market.】

item.title: 巴西 4 月汽车销量和产量均大幅增长
item.description: 巴西汽车制造商协会 Anfavea 周三称，4 月份巴西新车销量为 220,842 辆，环比增长 17.6%。【原文：Brazil's automakers' association Anfavea said on Wednesday that sales of new vehicles in the country rose 17.6% in April from the previous month to 220,842 units.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯否认阻止美国工厂成立工会的说法
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周三驳斥了有关其一直试图阻止阿拉巴马州工厂成立工会的说法。【原文：German premium carmaker Mercedes-Benz on Wednesday rejected claims that it has been trying to prevent the formation of a union at its Alabama plant.】

item.title: 富国银行任命费尔南多-里瓦斯为企业与投资银行业务联席首席执行官
item.description: 富国银行周三任命费尔南多-里瓦斯（Fernando Rivas）为企业与投资银行部（CIB）联席首席执行官。【原文：Wells Fargo on Wednesday named Fernando Rivas as the co-CEO of corporate and investment banking (CIB).】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）旗下星链公司（Starlink）获得印度尼西亚运营许可
item.description: 印度尼西亚通信部长周三告诉路透社，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的卫星部门已获得在印尼运营的许可。【原文：The satellite unit of Elon Musk's SpaceX has secured a permit to operate in Indonesia, the communications minister told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国撤销对中国客户的部分出口许可，英特尔收入受挫
item.description: 芯片制造商英特尔（Intel）周三表示，美国商务部将撤销其消费相关产品对中国客户的某些出口许可，此举将影响其第二季度的收入。【原文：Chipmaker Intel said on Wednesday the U.S. Department of Commerce was revoking certain export licenses for its consumer-related items to a customer in China, a move that would impact its second-quarter revenue.】

item.title: 在特斯拉自动驾驶调查中，美国检察官重点关注证券和电信欺诈
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，美国检方正在调查特斯拉是否在其电动汽车的自动驾驶功能方面误导投资者和消费者，从而构成证券欺诈或电信欺诈。【原文：U.S. prosecutors are examining whether Tesla committed securities or wire fraud by misleading investors and consumers about its electric vehicles’ self-driving capabilities, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 奥地利 Raiffeisen 银行放弃与 Strabag 的交易
item.description: 奥地利贷款银行 Raiffeisen Bank 周三发表声明称，已决定不再继续收购建筑集团 Strabag 的股份。【原文：Austrian lender Raiffeisen Bank has decided not to pursue the acquisition of a stake in construction group Strabag , it said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 艾默生电气因测量工具需求而提升 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 由于生产阀门、调节器和执行器的部门需求稳定，艾默生电气周三上调了全年利润预期，使得这家工程解决方案公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 2%。【原文：Emerson Electric raised its full-year profit forecast on Wednesday on steady demand in its unit that makes valves, regulators and actuators, sending the engineering solutions firm's shares up about 2% in premarket trade.】

item.title: 财报显示广告和人工智能许可收入潜力巨大，Reddit 股价大涨
item.description: 周三，Reddit 股价飙升 14%，因为这家社交媒体公司在上市后的首次财报中，以强劲的收入增长和不断改善的盈利能力令投资者大吃一惊。【原文：Reddit shares soared 14% on Wednesday after the social media firm floored investors with strong revenue growth and improving profitability in the first earnings since its market debut.】
